class.name: UserCredentialPasswordLoginService
class.description: UserCredentialPasswordLoginService This service creates password hashes using the BCRYPT cipher

interface.name: UserCredentialAuthenticationInterface
interface.description: UserCredentialAuthenticationInterface Interface that will be used by the Login Services

class.name: UserCredentialAbstract
class.description: This package implements user password policy and credential management

class.name: UserCredentialManager
class.description: UserCredentialManager Manage the authentication and password policy process

class.name: UserCredentialException
class.description: UserCredentialException This is the exception class for the user credential service
